price: 40. Wuxuuna (Sulaymaan) ku leeyahay Agtayada dhowaansho iyo meel noqod wanaagsan (Janno).
arabic: وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلۡفَىٰ وَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna lahu ʿindanā lazul'fā waḥus'na maābin
